title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modernize Legacy Applications with Agentic AI (DEV333)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用智能体AI现代化遗留应用程序 (DEV333)
abstract: Legacy monolithic codebases trap organizations in technical debt and slow innovation. Generative AI tools, including Amazon Q and AWS Transform, accelerate modernization through automated dependency analysis, code refactoring, and microservices migration. Practical patterns enable business continuity while transforming monoliths into scalable cloud-native services. Architects and developers will learn proven techniques for automated code analysis, strategic refactoring, and systematic migration to microservices architecture.
abstract_cn: 传统单体代码库使组织陷入技术债务并减缓创新速度。生成式AI工具，包括Amazon Q和AWS Transform，通过自动化依赖分析、代码重构和微服务迁移来加速现代化进程。实用模式能够在将单体应用转型为可扩展的云原生服务的同时确保业务连续性。架构师和开发人员将学习经过验证的自动化代码分析、战略性重构以及系统化迁移到微服务架构的技术。
